name: Anthony BOYLE and Maureen Boyle, h/w, Respondents. v. INDEPENDENT LIFT TRUCK, INC. and Frank Fatiga, Jr., Petitioners
name_abbreviation: Boyle v. Independent Lift Truck, Inc.

parties: Anthony BOYLE and Maureen Boyle, h/w, Respondents. v. INDEPENDENT LIFT TRUCK, INC. and Frank Fatiga, Jr., Petitioners.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 31st day of December, 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:
Did the Superior Court err in ordering a new trial due to an allegedly improper verdict slip question on comparative negligence, where the jury never reached the issue of comparative negligence?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
987 A2d 717
Anthony BOYLE and Maureen Boyle, h/w, Respondents. v. INDEPENDENT LIFT TRUCK, INC. and Frank Fatiga, Jr., Petitioners.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 31, 2009.
